FuncDef: This command displays subscriber Access Node Control Protocol (ANCP) string information.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an Access Node Control Protocol (ANCP) string up to 63 characters.
Specifies an existing customer ID. Values-1 to 2147483647.
Specifies an existing customer site name up to 32 characters.
Displays ANCP string information for the specified SAP ID.
